title: Godfrey Dadich Partners
headline: Godfrey Dadich combines the best of marketing, design, and journalism to help brands tell better stories.
description: As a design intern working primarily under GDPâ€™s Microsoft account, I worked with editorial teams, client stakeholders, and copywriters to develop inline art, data visualizations, illustrations, and social media assets for Microsoft WorkLab, a digital publication that explores the future of work.
